titles.title: To permit national banks to underwrite municipal revenue bonds.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Financial Institutions Supervision, Regulation and Deposit Insurance.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
committee.subcommittee: Financial Institutions Supervision, Regulation and Deposit Insurance

bill.summary: 3/31/1993--Introduced. Amends Federal banking law to permit a national bank to deal in, underwrite, and purchase for its own account municipal revenue bonds (thus providing enhanced financial services for State and local governments).
